tech.name: Hono
tech.description: Hono is an ultra-fast, lightweight framework based on web standards APIs. Optimized for edge environments, it enables rapid development of high-performance APIs and web applications.

tech.name: Waku
tech.description: Waku is a framework that simplifies the adoption of React Server Components (RSC). By performing rendering and data fetching on the server side, it dramatically improves initial load speed and overall site performance.

tech.name: Jotai
tech.description: Jotai is a simple and atomic React state management library. It minimizes boilerplate code and provides a flexible, lightweight mechanism to efficiently pass only the necessary state to the components that need it.
